name: LEEMON 2: Legend of the Bus Man (in development)
name_original: LEEMON 2: Legend of the Bus Man (in development)
description:
Join our friend LEEMON in another "adventure."

Now liberated from his Sisyphean task of running endlessly, LEEMON follows a ritual to summon the "Bus Man" of urban legend for some unspecified reason. Help him gather ingredients, perform the ritual, and discover the truth behind the myth.

Supposedly, one can summon an entity known as the "Bus Man" by placing a plate with a tuna salad sandwich and a glass of water at any metro bus stop between midnight and 3:00 am (very similar to setting out cookies and a glass of milk to dunk them in on Christmas eve). No one who has entered the bus has returned to tell the tale of what horrors lie within.

No one knows exactly who or what this mysterious being is (if he is real at all). Some speculate that he is simply a bus driver who never returned to the metro center. Others suppose he is something not from this world.  Some say that he was once a man, but--driven by madness or tragedy--he built himself into the bus, becoming part man and part machine.

I guess you'll just have to find out.
